raw_body: PROF. METHTHANANDA – THILAKA (nee KANKANIGE) – Retired Head of Department – History,​ University of Peradeniya),​ wife of E.A. Meththananda – retired M.D. – HDFC),​ mother of Himanga (Singapore),​ sister of Nimal (UK),​ Sujatha,​ Jayantha,​ Bandu,​ late Ranjith,​ Ananda,​ Upali and Palitha,​ sister-in-law of late Kulawathi,​ late Somaratne,​ late Malin and late Mallika,​ passed away. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella. Cortege leaves the Parlour on Saturday 4th November. Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella at 5.00 p.m.071509
